channel.title: Rush Ville | 24/7 | UNIQUE CREDIT ECONOMY | FREE PK GEAR | PRESTIGE | 317/614
channel.description:
[b]Rush Ville[/b]
Where Your Adventure Begins... We are a Runescape Private Server that had a lot of time spent on and a lot of attention to detail to tweak a perfect, smooth and amazing economy.
We have a Credits currency. There are 2 shops with the gear everybody wants, for Credits. To gather your Credits you need to level-up, PK, skill, do Slayer tasks, complete mini-games and more! NEW: You can now buy 250 credits for 50m GP to the NPC next to the Credit shop! http://gyazo.com/a1930b4db349d3660bed8429db3f37e2
If you guys are into PKing, then all the basic welfare PKing gear is FREE. But if you're feeling tough, then you can risk some Credit items in the wilderness!
We have also made ALL monsters drop Crystal Keys, these keys are used to open a chest at Edgeville so you can get a RANDOM CREDIT ITEM, and if you're lucky.. DRAGON CLAWS.
We have a lot of options for donators such as lowering their levels, dicing, ::bank, 10-50 Donator points (depending on how much you spend), first 20 get a FREE custom ::yell title, a donator island, donator only portals and areas and more!
All skills work 100% All prayers work 100% All specials work 100% All mini-games work 90% (Barrows slightly buggy)
So? What are you waiting for, start your adventure today!
LINKS
Website link:
http://www.rushville.weebly.com (Webclient Available) Instant download link: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/50ped86kg8ot085/rushville.jar
We hope to see you there! :D
Annotated screenshots below!
Credit Shops http://gyazo.com/c49905c41e796274444dddec8f7459a9 http://gyazo.com/fdc2c91929e55bf64dc004da6b5670e8
FREE Basic Gear [img]http://gyazo.com/e04f187501f4b1df1f1f42f16062bf6f
A Few Custom Items http://gyazo.com/24670fa3448379eb17818b23eff73130 http://gyazo.com/ae33bee717029f7e037f022c73ecb1fa
Special Attacks http://gyazo.com/918613adb12ad1b77802fccd2ff8795f http://gyazo.com/bd249e6961f7e4b2cd04790c5294739a http://gyazo.com/9a57f14bd31770a88b9ff9e3f52d7c90

item.description:
@JarnoM wrote:

                                                                   [b]Rush Ville[/b]

Where Your Adventure Begins…
We are a Runescape Private Server that had a lot of time spent on and a lot of attention to detail to tweak a perfect, smooth and amazing economy.

We have a Credits currency. There are 2 shops with the gear everybody wants, for Credits. To gather your Credits you need to level-up, PK, skill, do Slayer tasks, complete mini-games and more!
NEW: You can now buy 250 credits for 50m GP to the NPC next to the Credit shop!
http://gyazo.com/a1930b4db349d3660bed8429db3f37e2

If you guys are into PKing, then all the basic welfare PKing gear is FREE. But if you’re feeling tough, then you can risk some Credit items in the wilderness!

We have also made ALL monsters drop Crystal Keys, these keys are used to open a chest at Edgeville so you can get a RANDOM CREDIT ITEM, and if you’re lucky… DRAGON CLAWS.

We have a lot of options for donators such as lowering their levels, dicing, ::bank, 10-50 Donator points (depending on how much you spend), first 20 get a FREE custom ::yell title, a donator island, donator only portals and areas and more!

All skills work 100%
All prayers work 100%
All specials work 100%
All mini-games work 90% (Barrows slightly buggy)

So? What are you waiting for, start your adventure today!
